attributes.action: stop the new proposed council tax increases based on desirable qualaties as scenic views and being near a bus stop!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Documents obtained under the Freedom of Information Act show millions of homes homes have been given 'value significant codes' which will make virtually every desirable feature taxable.

This is a repugnant attempt to attack the very core of our homes and the few free pleasures we are still able to enjoy. Why should we have to pay to have a scenic view? Our income and our investments are already heavily taxed. What right do you claim to now tax the improvements we make to our homes so we may enjoy our lives by taxing such things as patio's or balconies? 

As the levels of public service plummet we are asked to give more of our hard earned income to bolster failing public and private institutions.  As the government staggers blind-drunk from one panic stricken move to another, this is a stagger too far!
